text:
General Comments:

- Plays cooperatively with other children but can find it difficult to share.
- Generally expresses needs and feelings in appropriate ways.
- Generally listens well at group time and contributes.
- Can write his name and is making good progress with his phonics.
- Can recognise members to 10.
- Particularly enjoys physical activities.

Issues Raised by Parents/Carers:

Outcomes of Issues Raised (to share at next Parent Evening):
